## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e831627bd13431af929f14093cc83d51763edbbb492e709860f63f33848fb9cf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'c8tsdk' @ 0.0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
